Reviews.Title: “Low price across from old town would stay again”

Reviews.Content: clean cable 2 hbo walked eat indoor flea market town fun stayed 2 nights lit staff friendlyyou pay extra wireless service muchi didnt bother internet paid 70 2 nights stay service didnt itif fitness center didnt itonly pool vending machines

Reviews.Title: “Average motel, some maintenance and deep cleaning needed.”
Reviews.Author: keithandmissy
Reviews.Content: stayed night driving adequate typical nofrills motel 6 style curtains broken stuck smoking nonsmokers nice hotels orlando sold night served rest heads road morning lots options cheap breakfast staff motel rude snarky told day replied im moved assist guest thats unacceptable customer service opinion otherwise stay fine

Reviews.Title: “OK for the price”
Reviews.Author: rosetta66
Reviews.Content: stayed night motel 6 march 17th 2012 pros clean friendly staff quick check location street town mcdonalds cons name buildings complex beds entire space pool laundry washing machines ice machine vending machines lobby bit pain microwave fridge stayed night beds comfortable hotel clean quiet ok price paid

Reviews.Title: “Happy here after reviewing many, many Kissimmee Hotels/Motels”
Reviews.Author: sleeplessinjax
Reviews.Content: spent nites surfing web reading reviews prices etc decided chance motel 6 booked 1 night amazed spotless roombath cleanest basic morning paid 3 additional nights location near disney surely return stayed fear enjoy

Reviews.Content: enjoy playing exterminate checked late hour complain infestation roaches spiders roach tub nine followed bed boards counter tops move bed wall hoping crawl sleep immediately bags car fear laying eggs late night stay sleeping sleep jeans sweater hoping dont wake bitten morning didnt shower bathroom dont look cleaned stay carpet weird stains reserved nonsmoking smoking impossible breath morning refund night following day booked staff didnt surprised tried getting rid quickly checking dont hears western wow difference extra 15 bucks makes

Reviews.Title: “Got what you paid for”
Reviews.Author: Cking09
Reviews.Content: stayed motel 6 line motels slowly downhill dead bolt stuck play lock stick close door internet pay doesnt tell check move call 800 try fix refund 299 charge worst bed size springs coming thru mattress check beds allowing guest stay cleanest motel 6

Reviews.Title: “A Good Bargain”
Reviews.Author: jcopel05
Reviews.Content: ive stayed motel 3 months plan returning weeki usually pay 2200 rates dont expect basic clean thats exactly getthe microwaves nor available 299 swimming pool laundry roomthe motel located accross town close eateries motel pet consthe super smallbut travel meit familythe carpet downstair tends upstairs noticed people pets prefer downstairs 299 day pricey found days connect hilton hotel door 10 tv rent 100 movies watch laptop sometimes ahead week ill bring dvd microwave travel iron lot time stayed 30 days saved overall weighs tipif irlo bronson motel theres 2 buffet restuarants serve 1st instead 2nd block 12 food cheaper

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE-DIRTY-UNCOMFORTABLE”
Reviews.Author: thelesters2009
Reviews.Content: chose town fun spot location price absolutely stay dead bugs light bugs beds stiff nights sleep pillows smelled own pillows reason double beds pulled covers dead bug tell bedbug bed sheets strip bed lay top comforter uncomfortable stay motel 6

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but I'll spend a little more next time.”

Reviews.Content: stayed evening epcot wdw basically sleep beds tiny husband 6 tall feet hung bed basically amenities shampooconditioner etc fairly clean bedding changed recently staff friendly appreciated didnt require credit card hold advance elvis car convention weekend pretty night stayed plus location miles wdw located mcdonalds convenient truth pay low prices didnt expect begin seedy types staying 4am fight broke couple outside horrible language screaming waking leaving unable rest cant blame hotel hotels attract clientele mean time spend little nicer nights sleep
